welcome.title: Stress-free registration.
welcome.subtitle: Welcome to the onboarding of the future.
welcome.loginDescription: Select your role and proceed to the system
welcome.startOnboardingDescription: Register a new company in the system

help.title: Need help?
help.description: For questions, contact us at +421 911 123 456 or info@utopia.sk

contactInfo.title: Contact Information
contactInfo.description: Fill in your basic contact details. This information will be used for automatic pre-filling of other registration steps.

fields.salesNote: Would you like to tell us something?
fields.salesNotePlaceholder: For example: Best time to contact, preferred communication method...

sidebar.autoFillDescription: Your contact details will be automatically used in the following steps

companyInfo.title: Company Information
companyInfo.description: Start by entering the company name. The system will automatically recognize the company and fill in all necessary data including the registered address.
companyInfo.searchPlaceholder: Enter company ID or company name

sidebar.title: Company Information
sidebar.description: Start by entering the company name. The system will automatically recognize the company and fill in all necessary data including the registered address.
sidebar.syncDescription: Registered address is automatically copied to the first business location.

businessLocation.title: Business Locations
businessLocation.description: Manage your business locations with detailed information about bank accounts, business activities and opening hours.
features: Detailed MCC codes and business subjects
Interactive opening hours with quick actions
Support for different currencies (EUR, CZK, USD)

sidebar.title: Business Information
sidebar.description: Manage your business locations with detailed information about bank accounts, business activities and opening hours.
sidebar.autoFillDescription: Your contact details will be automatically pre-filled for new locations based on your role "{{userRole}}".

deviceSelection.title: Device and Service Selection
deviceSelection.description: Select the devices and services you need for your business.

fees.title: Fees and Calculation
fees.description: Calculate your potential revenue based on selected services and expected turnover.

authorizedPersons.title: Authorized Persons
authorizedPersons.description: Authorized persons are statutory representatives or authorized persons who can act on behalf of the company.
features: Management of statutory and authorized persons
Data in accordance with official documents

empty.title: No authorized persons yet
empty.description: Add at least one statutory representative or authorized person

sidebar.title: Authorized Persons
sidebar.description: Authorized persons are statutory representatives or authorized persons who can act on behalf of the company.
requirements: Data must comply with official documents
Valid identity document required for each authorized person
At least one authorized person must be specified

actualOwners.title: Beneficial Owners
actualOwners.description: Beneficial owners are natural persons who actually own or control the company.

empty.title: No beneficial owners yet
empty.description: Add at least one ultimate beneficial owner

sidebar.title: Beneficial Owners
sidebar.description: Beneficial owners are natural persons who actually own or control the company.
ownerDefinition: Person who has direct or indirect ownership of at least 25%
Person who has the right to appoint or dismiss the statutory body
Person who otherwise controls the company

actualOwners.pepDescription: A politically exposed person is a person in a significant public function.

consents.title: Consents and Signature
consents.description: Final step of onboarding - confirmation of consents and electronic signature of the contract.

sidebar.title: Consents and Signature
sidebar.description: Final step of onboarding - confirmation of consents and electronic signature of the contract.

nextSteps.title: Next Steps
steps: After completing registration, a contract will be generated based on the entered data.
The contract will be sent to your email for electronic signing.
After signing the contract, your account will be activated and you can start using the services.
Devices will be delivered to the business address within 5 working days.

gdprConsent.title: Consent to personal data processing (GDPR) *
gdprConsent.description: I consent to the processing of personal data in accordance with GDPR for the purpose of concluding and fulfilling the payment services contract.

termsConsent.title: Consent to terms and conditions *
termsConsent.description: I agree to the terms and conditions of payment services provision and the fee schedule for provided services.

electronicCommunication.title: Consent to electronic communication
electronicCommunication.description: I consent to the delivery of documents and communication in electronic form to the specified email address.

consents.completeDescription: Grant consents and sign the contract
consents.selectPersonFirst: First select the signing person, then you can create an electronic signature.
consents.importantNote: All required fields must be completed, consents granted and electronic signature created before completing registration.

documentUpload.dragDrop: Drag file here or click to upload

businessDetails.title: Business Information
businessDetails.businessSubjectPlaceholder: Describe the main activities of your business...

notifications.signatureDescription: Electronic signature has been successfully saved
notifications.onboardingDescription: You can continue later from the same place
notifications.stepNotAccessibleDescription: You cannot skip multiple steps at once
